name: Secret Lover
description:
Secret Lover is a lonely game for a single player about keeping love a secret in which you keep a private journal about a secret lover you're seeing, recording intimate and personal events and thoughts. It requires no materials other than the ability to record your experiences and imagination, but may be emotional or intense at times, so please take care and consider using the Script Change toolkit (on itch.io or on briebeau.com) to help you take breaks, back up, or skip over anything that you don't need to detail. <3

Note: You do not have to play the role of yourself in this game! That is left open for your own experimentation.
